person.persName: Richard N. Lyons (Alabama, pvt 7th alabama cav (csa), prvt 1st Ky Light Artilley )

body.p: Kentucky soldier. Alabama native. Son of Mary Lyons. Resident in DeKalb County, Alabama, in 1850. Served in the 7th Alabama Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private. Captured at Winchester, Tennessee, on August 10, 1863. Prisoner of war at Louisville, Kentucky, from August 10, 1863. Released after signing a loyalty oath to the U.S. government on September 7, 1863. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as a private from September 10, 1863, to July 26, 1865.
